channel.title: For friendship
channel.description:
About the Boy Scouts of America 12th World Jamboree, held August 1-9, 1967, at Farragut State Park in Idaho.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Jamboree, part one
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, presents coverage of the 1967 Boy Scouts World Jamboree.
item.dc:creator: Jameson, Frank
item.dc:subject: NAEB Region VI: The West

item.title: Jamboree, part two
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, presents coverage of the 1967 Boy Scouts World Jamboree.
item.dc:creator: Jameson, Frank
item.dc:subject: NAEB Region VI: The West
